ingredients.ingredient: 2 large ripe avocados, peeled and pitted
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chiles, drained
2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, or to taste
1 large ripe avocado, peeled and pitted

cookingTips: Use fully ripe avocados that yield slightly to pressure for creamiest texture
Cream cheese adds richness and prevents browning; mix thoroughly into avocados
Add garlic salt and Worcestershire sauce gradually to control seasoning intensity
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why does this Tucson-style guacamole include cream cheese, and how does it differ from traditional recipes?
